title: The Shadow Boxer (Kinda Funny Animated Special)
description:
Created by pandamusk:  @pandamusk

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/subscription_c...

Get the Shadow Boxer shirt! http://www.districtlines.com/83882-Scarpino-Shadow-Boxing-Assoc.-Tee-T-Shirt/kindafunny

Get the Shadow Boxer Poster! https://www.districtlines.com/94568-T...

The spectacular '80s fueled adventure that is Nick Scarpino's life is finally revealed. This is based on a true story.


Watch Pandamusk's last video "Once upon A Tim" https://youtu.be/k74yB2q_NZ8


“Living Alive”
by Danny and Tori / 2-Player Co-Op
featuring Chris Dunleavy.

Get the song on Bandcamp!: https://dannywiessner.bandcamp.com/track/living-alive-feat-chris-dunleavy-2

Get the song on SOundCloud: https://soundcloud.com/danny-wiessner/livingalive

Music by Danny Wiessner @tuanews

Art by pandamusk  @pandamusk

transcript_chunks.text: in the you wake up to gravity each day a chance to bring you down a chance to bring you down we all have our heroes but where are they when you hit the ground you're on the ground but now you're getting back in the shadow the battle Your Shadow Boxing in the night a new fire within your eyes hard to kill that ember deep inside and now it's burning loud a new future in your sides you want that action behind the camera and Shining lights and all the lust of the crowd now you're a producer Seducer a true survivor in the fight against the darkness inside you open your eyes you look at this life we're living the sights and the sounds today is a gift we're given we're GI you're the champion the edge of the knife and the hero and the now is when you're living most a new rock producer Seducer a true survivor in the fight against the darkness inside you open your eyes you look at this life for the s in the today is a gift we're GI you're the champion

rock producer Seducer a true survivor in the fight against the darkness inside you open your eyes you look at this life for the s in today is a gift we're GI Joe we're GI Joe you're the the champion the edge of the knife and the here and the now is when you're most most alive
